official_title: To provide for the construction, operation, and maintenance of a connector road in Lemay, Missouri.

summary.text: States that for the purpose of constructing, operating, and maintaining a connector road known as the Lemay Connector Road (St. Louis County Arterial Road 1151) in the city and county of St. Louis, Missouri, no provision of federal law that requires a deed restriction shall apply to parcels of real property depicted on a specified map filed with the St. Louis County department of highways and traffic and available for public inspection.

titles.title: To provide for the construction, operation, and maintenance of a connector road in Lemay, Missouri.
